meanings.meaning_en_US: A distinct part of a larger organization.

examples.sentence: He works in the marketing [department].
examples.translation_zh_TW: 他在市場部門工作。

examples.sentence: The finance [department] is responsible for budgeting.
examples.translation_zh_TW: 財務部門負責預算。

examples.sentence: She was promoted within her [department].
examples.translation_zh_TW: 她在部門內晉升了。

meanings.meaning_en_US: A spoken or written representation or account of a person, object, or event.

examples.sentence: The [description] of the painting was quite vivid.
examples.translation_zh_TW: 這幅畫的描述非常生動。

examples.sentence: Her [description] of the city made me want to visit.
examples.translation_zh_TW: 她對這座城市的描述讓我渴望造訪。

examples.sentence: Can you provide a detailed [description] of the incident?
examples.translation_zh_TW: 你能提供事件的詳細描述嗎？

meanings.meaning_en_US: The standard of something as measured against other things of a similar kind; the degree of excellence of something.

examples.sentence: The quality of the product is very high.
examples.translation_zh_TW: 這個產品的品質非常高

examples.sentence: She always strives for quality in her work.
examples.translation_zh_TW: 她總是追求工作中的品質

examples.sentence: Quality control ensures that company standards are met.
examples.translation_zh_TW: 品質控制確保滿足公司標準

meanings.meaning_en_US: Intended for or restricted to the use of a particular person or group.

examples.sentence: She has a [private] meeting with her advisor.
examples.translation_zh_TW: 她和她的顧問有個私人會議

examples.sentence: This area is [private] and should not be accessed without permission.
examples.translation_zh_TW: 這個區域是私人場所，未經許可不得進入

examples.sentence: He values his [private] time for relaxation.
examples.translation_zh_TW: 他重視休息的私人時間

meanings.meaning_en_US: To go to see someone or something for a short time.

examples.sentence: I will [visit] my grandmother this weekend.
examples.translation_zh_TW: 我這個週末要去拜訪奶奶

examples.sentence: She decided to [visit] the museum.
examples.translation_zh_TW: 她決定去造訪博物館

examples.sentence: Can we [visit] the new cafe later?
examples.translation_zh_TW: 我們可以稍後去造訪新咖啡館嗎？

meanings.meaning_en_US: To respond to a question or request.

examples.sentence: Please [reply] to the email as soon as you can.
examples.translation_zh_TW: 請儘快回覆這封電子郵件

examples.sentence: I will [reply] to your message later.
examples.translation_zh_TW: 我稍後會回覆你的訊息

examples.sentence: Don't forget to [reply] to the invitation.
examples.translation_zh_TW: 別忘了回覆邀請函

meanings.meaning_en_US: A person who buys goods or services.

examples.sentence: The store always welcomes every [customer] with a smile.
examples.translation_zh_TW: 這家商店總是用微笑迎接每一位顧客。

examples.sentence: He is a loyal [customer] of that restaurant.
examples.translation_zh_TW: 他是那家餐廳的忠實顧客。

examples.sentence: Good service helps retain [customers].
examples.translation_zh_TW: 良好的服務有助於留住顧客。

meanings.meaning_en_US: To examine the similarities and/or differences.

examples.sentence: I will [compare] the prices of these two products.
examples.translation_zh_TW: 我將比較這兩個產品的價格

examples.sentence: It's important to [compare] options before deciding.
examples.translation_zh_TW: 在決定之前比較選項是很重要的

examples.sentence: They often [compare] their notes after class.
examples.translation_zh_TW: 他們經常在課後比較筆記

meanings.meaning_en_US: To comprise or contain as part of a whole.

examples.sentence: The package will [include] a user manual.
examples.translation_zh_TW: 這個包裹將包括使用手冊。

examples.sentence: Please [include] your contact information.
examples.translation_zh_TW: 請包括您的聯繫方式。

examples.sentence: The team will [include] members from all departments.
examples.translation_zh_TW: 這個團隊將包括所有部門的成員。

meanings.meaning_en_US: An educational institution or establishment, particularly one for higher education.

examples.sentence: She decided to attend [college] after high school.
examples.translation_zh_TW: 她決定在高中後上大學。

examples.sentence: The [college] offers various degree programs.
examples.translation_zh_TW: 該大學提供多種學位課程。

examples.sentence: Many students struggle to finance their [college] education.
examples.translation_zh_TW: 許多學生在資助他們的大学教育方面掙扎。

meanings.meaning_en_US: A piece of writing included with others in a newspaper, magazine, or other publication.

examples.sentence: She wrote an [article] for the local newspaper.
examples.translation_zh_TW: 她為當地報紙寫了一篇文章

examples.sentence: The [article] discussed various environmental issues.
examples.translation_zh_TW: 這篇文章討論了各種環境問題

examples.sentence: Read the [article] to learn more about the topic.
examples.translation_zh_TW: 閱讀這篇文章以了解更多主題

meanings.meaning_en_US: To supply or make available something needed.

examples.sentence: They [provide] food and shelter for the homeless.
examples.translation_zh_TW: 他們為無家可歸者提供食物和住所。

examples.sentence: The company aims to [provide] excellent service.
examples.translation_zh_TW: 該公司旨在提供優質服務。

examples.sentence: Can you [provide] me with any information on this?
examples.translation_zh_TW: 你能給我提供任何相關信息嗎？

meanings.meaning_en_US: The point of origin or the beginning of something.

examples.sentence: The river is the main [source] of water for the region.
examples.translation_zh_TW: 這條河是該地區的主要水來源

examples.sentence: He is my [source] of inspiration.
examples.translation_zh_TW: 他是我的靈感來源

examples.sentence: Please provide the [source] of your information.
examples.translation_zh_TW: 請提供您資訊的來源

meanings.meaning_en_US: A person who writes books, articles, or other texts.

examples.sentence: The [author] of the book will be signing copies.
examples.translation_zh_TW: 這本書的作者將簽名書籍

examples.sentence: She is a well-known [author] in the field of science.
examples.translation_zh_TW: 她是一位知名的科學作者

examples.sentence: The [author] received an award for her novel.
examples.translation_zh_TW: 這位作者因她的小說獲獎

meanings.meaning_en_US: The originator or creator of something.

examples.sentence: He is considered the [author] of the theory.
examples.translation_zh_TW: 他被認為是這個理論的創造者

examples.sentence: The [authors] of the project worked collaboratively.
examples.translation_zh_TW: 該項目的創造者進行了合作

examples.sentence: Each [author] must acknowledge their sources.
examples.translation_zh_TW: 每位創作者必須確認他們的來源

meanings.meaning_en_US: To exert pressure on something.

examples.sentence: Please [press] the button.
examples.translation_zh_TW: 請[按壓]按鈕。

examples.sentence: He [presses] the cloth to remove water.
examples.translation_zh_TW: 他[按壓]布料以去除水分。

examples.sentence: She [pressed] the flowers in a book.
examples.translation_zh_TW: 她將花[按壓]在書中。

meanings.meaning_en_US: To produce (a book, newspaper, etc.) by printing.

examples.sentence: Please [print] the document before the meeting.
examples.translation_zh_TW: 請在會議前打印文件

examples.sentence: I need to [print] my homework.
examples.translation_zh_TW: 我需要打印我的作業

examples.sentence: Can you [print] this photo for me?
examples.translation_zh_TW: 你能幫我打印這張照片嗎？

meanings.meaning_en_US: The direction toward the left of a person facing north, 270 degrees on a compass.

examples.sentence: The sun sets in the [west].
examples.translation_zh_TW: 太陽在西方落下。

examples.sentence: We traveled [west] to reach the coast.
examples.translation_zh_TW: 我們向西旅行，抵達了海岸。

examples.sentence: He lives [west] of the city.
examples.translation_zh_TW: 他住在城市的西邊。

meanings.meaning_en_US: To carefully choose as being the best or most suitable.

examples.sentence: Please [select] your preferred option.
examples.translation_zh_TW: 請選擇您偏好的選項。

examples.sentence: They will [select] the best candidate for the job.
examples.translation_zh_TW: 他們將選擇最合適的候選人。

examples.sentence: You should [select] a book that interests you.
examples.translation_zh_TW: 您應該選擇一本讓您感興趣的書。

meanings.meaning_en_US: A period of seven days.

examples.sentence: There are seven days in a [week].
examples.translation_zh_TW: 一周有七天。

examples.sentence: I work five days a [week].
examples.translation_zh_TW: 我每周工作五天。

examples.sentence: Next [week], we will have a meeting.
examples.translation_zh_TW: 下周我們將有一個會議。
